column4: hello there, i'm on breezy. i've this error after a Xorg upgrade: Failed to load module "nv" (module does not exists, 0) and the same for module "mouse" and for module "keyboard". Any idea?
I'm on breezy and haven't seen that error
i've done an upgrade 1 hour ago
hmm.. maybe some paths have changed
he sets the pathModule to /usr/X11R6/lib/modules, i believe is ok
one second, i prepare a page and put in that some info
hmmm.. is nv in any of the subdirs ?
you can tell me in exact name?
so i'll looking for it in the system
all is changed. Now there are packages as xserver-xorg-driver and xserver-xorg-input, and you must choose the right packages..cool :)
